title: Tiernan Martin
text:
Tiernan Martin leads the land use planning research program at Futurewise. His work focuses on the advancement of healthy, affordable, vibrant urban neighborhoods in the Puget Sound region. Tiernan’s approach combines expertise in geospatial data science, understanding of regulatory frameworks and processes, and experience collaborating with community leaders and local organization staff. He engages in research and advocacy with neighborhood groups, community development organizations, advocacy groups, academic researchers, and government bodies.



Futurewise | Seattle, WA

Director of Research | August 2023–present Program Manager | January 2018–August 2023 Data and Policy Analyst | December 2015–January 2018

Seattle Chinatown-International District Preservation & Development Authority | Seattle, WA

Research Assistant | February 2015–October 2015




University of Washington | Seattle, WA | 2013–2015Urban Design and Planning
McGill University | Montreal, QC | 2004–2008Political Science
